name: 林祐民
objective:
這門課將由老師帶領同學們輕鬆探索古典音樂的演變歷程！我們會透過課堂講解和精選影片，詳細介紹巴洛克時期的華麗裝飾、古典時期的均衡優雅、浪漫時期的情感奔放等不同風格特色。老師會用淺顯易懂的方式，從樂曲形式、配器手法到歷史背景，帶大家認識每首經典作品的獨特之處。課程中特別安排音樂會體驗，讓同學能親身感受樂器演奏的現場魅力。希望透過這樣兼具知識性與趣味性的課程設計，讓大家自然而然地愛上古典音樂，開啟對管弦樂藝術的欣賞之門！
This course will guide students on an engaging journey through the evolution of classical music! With a mix of lively lectures and carefully selected videos, we’ll explore the distinct styles of each era—from the ornate decorations of the Baroque period, to the balanced elegance of the Classical era, and the emotional intensity of the Romantic age. The teacher will explain musical forms, orchestration techniques, and historical context in a clear and approachable way, helping students discover the unique charm of each masterpiece. A special highlight of the course is a live concert experience, giving students the chance to feel the power of orchestral performance firsthand. Through this fun and informative course design, we hope to spark a natural love for classical music and open the door to appreciating the art of orchestral music.
